Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera!
Reviews.Author: Erik Oyangen "Blind Gym Rat"
Reviews.Content: I love the camera!  It works great and the pictures are better than my Cannon.  Like the videos on YouTube, i took a picture of the moon, holding it freehand!

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the money!!
Reviews.Author: Carl Warren
Reviews.Content: What a beautiful camera!! My wife loved it and can't wait to use it on our upcoming cruise. The zoom is amazing and the camera is very easy to use. I'm very pleased with my purchase and all of the accessories that came with this camera.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic pictures! Excellent camera and accessories.
Reviews.Author: Curtis C. Kinsman
Reviews.Content: Excellent camera and accessories. Great price! Fantastic pictures. Very please with the camera and packaged accessories. Would highly recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Amazing Camera!
Reviews.Author: TBronson
Reviews.Content: I searched for the right camera before our family vacation - and after looking around locally and settling on the right product - came to Amazon and got this great package full of accessories, for the same price as only the camera in local stores!  This truly is the easiest to use, best quality camera I've ever owned.  You almost can't take a bad picture with it!  Zoom is incredible.  Sat in the stands at a recent football game and took clear headshots of my daughter sitting across the stadium from us.  Unbelievable!  And the seller is awesome.+

Reviews.Title: worth the price
Reviews.Author: Prosthodontist
Reviews.Content: Im not going to talk about the specifications of digital camera. But the package is good I suggest the cam with pack

<4> Battery Charger for NP-BX1 + <5> PD 50" Compact Travel Tripod + <6> 55mm 3pc (UV/FLD/CPL) Filter +
<7> PD Mini Sling Backpack + <8> PD SDHC Memory Card Reader + <9> PD 5pc Complete Cleaning Kit +
<10> PD Memory Card Storage Wallet + <11> LCD Monitor Screen Protectors + <12> Image Recovery Software
ProductInfo.Name: Sony Cyber-Shot DSC-HX300 Digital Camera (Black) with 32GB Card + Battery & Charger + Backpack + Tripod + 3 Filters + Accessory Kit
